title: Global Multi-Asset Tactical Allocation Strategy

issues.title: Market calendar not specified for 'last day of month'
issues.description: States 'last day of each month' but doesn't specify which market's calendar determines trading days
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'last NYSE trading day of each calendar month'

issues.title: 'Next available day' ambiguous across markets
issues.description: If month-end is non-trading, uses 'next available day' but doesn't specify which market's next trading day
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'next NYSE trading day (even if it falls in the following calendar month)'

issues.title: 60 days ambiguous - trading or calendar days?
issues.description: Momentum uses 'previous 60 days' but doesn't specify if these are trading days or calendar days
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'previous 60 trading days (NYSE calendar)' or 'previous 60 calendar days'

issues.title: 1-month period ambiguous
issues.description: '1-month return' could mean 20 trading days, 30 calendar days, or 1 calendar month
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: '1-month return calculated over 21 NYSE trading days'

issues.title: 3-month period ambiguous
issues.description: '3-month return' could mean 60 trading days, 90 calendar days, or 3 calendar months
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: '3-month return calculated over 63 NYSE trading days'

issues.title: 6-month period ambiguous
issues.description: '6-month return' could mean 120 trading days, 180 calendar days, or 6 calendar months
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: '6-month return calculated over 126 NYSE trading days'

issues.title: 90 days for correlation matrix - trading or calendar?
issues.description: Correlation matrix uses 'past 90 days' without specifying trading vs calendar days
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'past 90 calendar days of available daily returns (excluding weekends and holidays)'

issues.title: Cross-market alignment strategy not specified
issues.description: US equities and Japanese bonds have different market calendars and holidays. Alignment strategy not specified.
issues.original_text: align the data using common trading days
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Use only dates when both NYSE and TSE are open (intersection)' or 'Use all available data with forward-fill for market closures' or 'Align to NYSE calendar, forward-fill Japanese data'

issues.title: Multi-asset implies multiple calendars not addressed
issues.description: Strategy is 'Global Multi-Asset' but doesn't specify how to handle different market calendars for different assets
issues.suggested_fix: Add section specifying primary market calendar for rebalancing and how to handle assets from other markets

issues.title: Timezone not specified for rebalancing
issues.description: Rebalancing occurs 'on the last day' but doesn't specify time or timezone, important for global assets
issues.original_text: rebalanced monthly, on the last day of each month

issues.title: Holiday handling for different markets not specified
issues.description: Global strategy but no specification for handling holidays that differ across markets
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'For assets on different exchanges, use asset-specific trading days. Exclude days when that specific market is closed.'

notes: This document exemplifies the critical market calendar issues identified in ADR-018

definitions.definition: rebalanced monthly, on the last day of each month
calculated using returns over the previous 60 days
computed using the past 90 days of daily returns for all assets
